item.cxivov_mod.music_disc_baca.desc: Demikát - Ja som bača veľmo starý
advancements.proverbs.root.title: Slovak proverbs
advancements.proverbs.root.description: Yes, they are kinda weird and untranslatable, we know... just ask a Slovak friend to play with you
advancements.proverbs.cez_zaludok.title: Láska ide cez žalúdok
advancements.proverbs.cucky_z_rucky.desc: "Blueberries fell out of my hand". That's not a proverb, I just once said that and now it's a meme
advancements.proverbs.cudzim_perim.title: Pýši sa cudzím perím
advancements.proverbs.do_lesa.title: Kto sa bojí, nech nejde do lesa
advancements.proverbs.do_lesa.descriptio: "Who's scared shouldn't go to the forest"
advancements.proverbs.doma_najlepsie.des: "Everywhere is well, but the best is only at home!"
advancements.proverbs.halusky.title: Knows more than to just eat halušky
advancements.proverbs.halusky.descriptio: Try the pinnacle of the Slovak cuisine: bryndzové halušky!
advancements.proverbs.huby.title: Rastie ako huby po daždi
advancements.proverbs.ihlu.title: Ako hľadať ihlu v kope sena
advancements.proverbs.ihlu.description: "Looking for a needle in a haystack"
advancements.proverbs.kamen.title: Nezostane kameň na kameni
advancements.proverbs.kamen.description: "No stone will be left unturned"... oh, this one is nearly the same as in English!
advancements.proverbs.kamen_urazu.title: Kameň úrazu
advancements.proverbs.kamen_urazu.descri: "The stone of injury", the problematic part
advancements.proverbs.kapce.title: Babka k babce a sú kapce
advancements.proverbs.kapce.description: "Save cent by cent and you can get boots!"
advancements.proverbs.kolace.title: Bez práce nie sú koláče!
advancements.proverbs.kolace.description: Make a pie! (also, it means "No pain, no gain")
advancements.proverbs.koniec.title: Koniec dobrý, všetko dobré
advancements.proverbs.koniec.description: "The end's well, all's well" (it's a pun on The End)
advancements.proverbs.lala.title: Ľaľa!
advancements.proverbs.lala.description: ako sa to teľa v tej ďateline váľa! "Look at that calf rolling the grass!" (it sounds so much better in the original)
advancements.proverbs.malo_muziky.title: Za málo peňazí málo muziky
advancements.proverbs.medved.title: Lebo medveď!
advancements.proverbs.medved.description: "Because a bear!" (like, you don't have a reason for it... man, translating these is impossible)
advancements.proverbs.mnich.title: Bol jeden mních
advancements.proverbs.mnich.description: mal veľa kníh, nič nevedel z nich (just place a bookshelf, I give up)
advancements.proverbs.mysi.title: Dobre je myšiam
advancements.proverbs.mysi.description: keď mačky doma nieto ("Mice are well when the cat's not home")
advancements.proverbs.nehas.title: Nehas, čo ťa nepáli!
advancements.proverbs.nepreskocis.title: Nehovor hop, kým nepreskočíš!
advancements.proverbs.nosit_drevo.title: Nosiť drevo do lesa
advancements.proverbs.nosit_drevo.descri: "Carrying wood into a forest"... yes, there are already tonnes of it there, that's the point of the proverb
advancements.proverbs.oci_nevidia.title: Čo oči nevidia, srdce nebolí
advancements.proverbs.oci_nevidia.descri: "What the eyes can't see doesn't ache the heart"
advancements.proverbs.oci_vyocit.title: Oči vyočiť!
advancements.proverbs.ozyva.title: Ako sa do hory volá
advancements.proverbs.ozyva.description: tak sa z hory ozýva ("How one yells into the forest, the forest will echo")
advancements.proverbs.pod_lampou.title: Pod lampou je najväčšia tma
advancements.proverbs.pomaly.title: Pomaly ďalej zájdeš
advancements.proverbs.psa_bit.title: Kto chce psa biť
advancements.proverbs.psa_bit.descriptio: palicu si nájde ("Who wants to hit a dog will find a stick"... Slovak proverbs sure are cruel)
advancements.proverbs.robi_zlodeja.title: Príležitosť robí zlodeja
advancements.proverbs.saty.title: Šaty robia človeka!
advancements.proverbs.saty.description: "The way one dresses makes them a person"
advancements.proverbs.slinu.title: Chytiť slinu
advancements.proverbs.stareho_psa.title: Starého psa nové triky nenaučíš
advancements.proverbs.stareho_psa.descri: "You can't teach an old dog new tricks"
advancements.proverbs.vela_muziky.title: Za veľa peňazí veľa muziky
advancements.proverbs.vela_muziky.descri: "A lot of money, a lot of music"
advancements.proverbs.voz.title: Ani z voza, ani na voz
advancements.proverbs.voz.description: "Not well off the cart, not well on the cart"
advancements.proverbs.vysoko_lieta.title: Kto vysoko lieta, hlboko padá
advancements.proverbs.vysoko_lieta.descr: "Who fies high, falls a long distance" (I swear it sounds better in original)
advancements.proverbs.z_neba.title: Nik učený z neba nespadol
advancements.proverbs.z_neba.description: "Nobody has fallen out of the skies with a degree"
advancements.proverbs.zaseje.title: Ako si kto zaseje, tak bude žať
advancements.proverbs.zeleni.title: Komu sa nelení, tomu sa zelení
advancements.proverbs.zeleni.description: "Who's not lazy,... greens??" This is just a forced rhyme, I think
cxivov_mod.zlate_stranky.title: Zlaté stránky
cxivov_mod.zlate_stranky.description: Click on a profession to highlight all villagers of that kind within 100 blocks:
cxivov_mod.zlate_stranky.chat.all: Highlighting all villagers within 100 blocks of %s

cxivov_mod.zlate_stranky.chat.butcher: Highlighting all butchers within 100 blocks of %s

cxivov_mod.zlate_stranky.chat.weaponsmit: Highlighting all weaponsmiths within 100 blocks of %s

cxivov_mod.zlate_stranky.chat.wandering: Highlighting all wandering traders within 100 blocks of %s
